actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Banking.
Committee on Banking requested executive comment from HUD.
Committee on Banking. Provisions of measure incorporated into measure S. 1338 ordered to be reported.

committees.committee: Senate Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs

official_title: A bill to require the Secretary of Housing and Urban Development to administer a demonstration program for assisting communities and nonprofit organizations in providing emergency shelter.
short_title: Temporary Emergency Shelter Demonstration Program Act of 1983

summary.text: Temporary Emergency Shelter Demonstration Program Act of 1983 - Directs the Secretary of Housing and Urban Development to conduct a demonstration program under which grants will be provided to assist communities or nonprofit organizations to provide shelter for people subject to life-threatening situations because of their lack of housing. Requires the Secretary to make such grants on a competitive basis according to the need for emergency housing. Directs the Secretary to report to Congress on such program and to use a specified amount of the funds appropriated for additional authority for annual contributions for lower income housing projects during FY 1983 to carry out this Act.

titles.title: Temporary Emergency Shelter Demonstration Program Act of 1983
A bill to require the Secretary of Housing and Urban Development to administer a demonstration program for assisting communities and nonprofit organizations in providing emergency shelter.
